name: Hakros Complex (Map for Doom 2)
description:
Hi everyone, i've been playing doom since 1996 but never had made any map before, so i'hope you like my first attemp.

Better play in vanilla mode, due the map with mods is not recommendable because in some places the performance it's not good with them.

Thanks for your time.

Good hunt and i'll hope you can survive !

--------------------------------------------------------

Instructions

  • You need the doom2.wad to play, just copy the iwad file into 'games\' folder
  • Standalone version includes also GZDoom, HD standard textures and OTEX textures

--------------------------------------------------------

Name: Hakros Complex

Version: 1.5
Format: UDMF
Ports Tested: GZDoom
IWAD: Doom2.wad
Map: MAP01
Gameplay: Single player and cooperative (max 8 players)
Build Time: 3 weeks
Textures: OTEX (included on standalone version)
Jumping: Allowed and needed﻿
Crouching: Allowed and needed
Freelook: Allowed
Difficulty: Just one UV++﻿
Dehacked file: Yes

Enemies: 5.000
Secrets: 60
